item.description:
Join us for drinks, dinner and fun times with outgoing and friendly people at Sky Restaurant in Sudbury. Sky is well known for its great food and pleasant atmosphere. So if you haven't been there, it is definitely worth checking out.

Each person pays for their own food/drinks. Joint event with the New England 25+ Social Fun group. It will be a fun night! If you have trouble finding us, plese call 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Dinner, Drinks and Fun Times at Sky Restaurant, Sudbury
